bio_zh: 專注台式家常與創新拼盤，15年餐飲經驗。
bio_en: Focuses on Taiwanese comfort classics and creative platters; 15 years experience.

bio_zh: 擅長滷與炸的火候，標準化出餐流程。
bio_en: Masters braising & frying; champions standardized pass.

bio_zh: 服務控與數據控，熱愛把顧客回饋轉成改進清單。
bio_en: Service & data driven; turns feedback into action.
